artist: Artist: Joseph Beuys; Publisher: Edition Staeck, Heidelberg, Germany
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Photograph shows Beuys with students leaving the Secretariat of the Staatliche Kunstakademie Düsseldorf, October 10, 1972, after the occupation of the secretariat for unrestricted access to education was ended by the entry of the police.
image_copyright: © Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F VG Bild-Kunst%2C Germany
inscription:
Printed inscription, UL corner, verso: originalgrafik - serie D / nr. 5 joseph beuys / demokratie ist lustig

Publisher information, LL corner, verso
medium: Screenprint in black and green with handwritten text, on cardstock paper
provenance: [Multiples, Inc., New York]; sold to MIA, 1974.
title: Demokratie ist lustig (Democracy is Merry)
